text: Ron asks salt to be passed to him, instead of leaning on the table to reach out.
Sam is done with his food and he gets up while others at the table are still eating.
Ryan licks fingers as he eats his favourite food.
Ben slurps soup making a loud noise.
Zain is seated upright on the table.
Frank makes a fuss as he does not like the food.
Roma eats with the spoon in the serving dish.
